LanguageData.VRE_MessageCantUseOnNonSanguophage: The sanguofeed ability can only be used on hemogenic people
LanguageData.VRE_MessageCantUseOnDrainedSanguophage: The sanguofeed ability can't be used on Sanguophages completely drained of hemogen
LanguageData.VRE_NoHeart: Can only be used on targets with a heart
LanguageData.VRE_HemogenValveDesc: Switches hemogen flow on/off. A pawn will come open/close the valve.
LanguageData.VRE_CommandDraincasketEjectDesc: Eject occupant from this draincasket. This will interrupt the hemogen extraction and leave the occupant dizzy due to the bloodloss.
LanguageData.VRE_CommandDraincasketEjectFailEmpty: Can't eject occupant, since draincasket is empty
LanguageData.VRE_DraincasketAmountTooltip: Sets the amount of hemogen packs the draincaskets will produce per day. By default, it is 2 hemogen packs per day.
LanguageData.VRE_NoAnomalies: Cannot be used on Revenant or Nociospheres
